title: Life Magic Users Dungeon Dive - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Adapted to Manga   Clubs   Dungeons   Multiple Protagonists   Oneshot   Sword And Magic
author: Okano Kyoukai   丘野境界
description: Due to pressure from the Magic Academy’s Combat Department, the LIfe Magic Department’s budget is reduced to nearly nothing. To get some quick cash its three members — Reeone, Souko, and Kenny — go dungeon diving. Meanwhile, at the academy several problems start popping up…!>
